title: I am an architecture student at UIUC and I am doing research on area in and around Lake Forest (Ft. Sheridan, Highwood, Highland Park) and I found information that states that there is a HUGE veterans population in this area even though Ft. Sheridan has been decommissioned since the late 1980\'s.  Why is that?
text:
The focus of MyReporter.com is answering questions about life in
Coastal North Carolina. That's where we devote our resources.
Unfortunately, your question does not meet that criteria.
